description:
Detects potential commandline obfuscation using unicode characters.
Adversaries may attempt to make an executable or file difficult to discover or analyze by encrypting, encoding, or otherwise obfuscating its contents on the system or in transit.
author: frack113
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Commandline Obfuscation Using Unicode Characters
query: ((process.command_line.text:("*ˣ*" OR "*˪*" OR "*ˢ*")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*∕*" OR "*⁄*")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*―*" OR "*—*")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*â*" OR "*€*" OR "*£*" OR "*¯*" OR "*®*" OR "*µ*" OR "*¶*")))
